Package de.thm.stumm.patientmanager.view

Class PatientView

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.thm.stumm.patientmanager.view.View
      • de.thm.stumm.patientmanager.view.PatientView
  • public class PatientView
extends View
    View containing methods for managing patients and users of the application.
    Author:
    Dennis Stumm

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.lang.String[][] actions
      Nested string array with the actions of this view.
      private PatientController controller
      Controller that handles the user interactions and communicates with the models.
      private java.util.Scanner scanner
      Scanner object that is used to read user input from the console.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PatientView​(PatientController controller)
      Initializes the PatientView.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void createPatient()
      Renders the view for creating a new patient, reads the inputs and calls the necessary method on the controller.
      private void createUser()
      Renders the view for creating a new user, reads the inputs and calls the necessary method on the controller.
      private void deletePatient()
      Renders the view for deleting a patient, reads the inputs and calls the necessary method on the controller.
      private void deleteUser()
      Renders the view for deleting a user, reads the inputs and calls the necessary method on the controller.
      private void dischargePatient()
      Renders the view for discharging a patient, reads the inputs and calls the necessary method on the controller.
      private void editIcdOfPatient()
      Renders the view for editing the icd of a patient, reads the inputs and calls the necessary method on the controller.
      private void exit()
      Calls the methods to persisting the data and finishes the program.
      private Patient getPatient()
      Reads the id of a patient from the user input and searches the patient with the given id.
      private void handleActionSelection()
      Reads the input from the console and determines which method should be called or which action should be executed.
      private void printPatients()
      Prints out to the console all patients that are available in this application.
      private int readInt​(java.lang.String message)
      Forces the user to input an integer and returns the inputted integer.
      private int readInt​(java.lang.String message, int min, int max)
      Forces the user to input an integer in the passed range and returns the inputted integer.
      private java.lang.String readString​(java.lang.String message, boolean allowEmpty)
      Forces the user to input a string and returns the inputted string.
      void render()
      Renders the main menu for the patient view on the console.
      private void returnToMainMenu​(java.lang.String message)
      Returns to the main menu after printing out the passed message and forcing the user to press enter.
      private void searchPatientById()
      Renders the view for searching a patient by the id, reads the inputs and calls the necessary method on the controller.
      private void searchPatientsByName()
      Renders the view for searching patients by last name, reads the inputs and calls the necessary method on the controller.
      private void showActionSelect()
      Renders the main menu on the console.

    • Field Detail

      • actions

        private final java.lang.String[][] actions
        Nested string array with the actions of this view.

        Each element of the array is an array of strings containing as the first element a description and as the second element the name of the method to be called when the user selects the corresponding action.

      • controller

        private PatientController controller
        Controller that handles the user interactions and communicates with the models.

      • scanner

        private java.util.Scanner scanner
        Scanner object that is used to read user input from the console.

    • Constructor Detail

        Initializes the PatientView.
        Parameters:
        controller - Controller that handles the user interactions and communicates with the models.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render()
        Renders the main menu for the patient view on the console.

      • createPatient

        private void createPatient()
        Renders the view for creating a new patient, reads the inputs and calls the necessary method on the controller.

      • createUser

        private void createUser()
        Renders the view for creating a new user, reads the inputs and calls the necessary method on the controller.

      • deletePatient

        private void deletePatient()
        Renders the view for deleting a patient, reads the inputs and calls the necessary method on the controller.

        private void deleteUser()
        Renders the view for deleting a user, reads the inputs and calls the necessary method on the controller.

      • dischargePatient

        private void dischargePatient()
        Renders the view for discharging a patient, reads the inputs and calls the necessary method on the controller.

        private void editIcdOfPatient()
        Renders the view for editing the icd of a patient, reads the inputs and calls the necessary method on the controller.

      • exit

        private void exit()
        Calls the methods to persisting the data and finishes the program.

      • getPatient

        private Patient getPatient()
        Reads the id of a patient from the user input and searches the patient with the given id.

        When the patient for the given id was found, the patient will be returned. Otherwise the user is forced to input an id as long as no patient is found for the inputted id.

        Returns:
        The patient that was found for the inputted id.

      • handleActionSelection

        private void handleActionSelection()
        Reads the input from the console and determines which method should be called or which action should be executed. After determining the necessary method it gets called dynamically.

      • printPatients

        private void printPatients()
        Prints out to the console all patients that are available in this application.

      • readInt

        private int readInt​(java.lang.String message)
        Forces the user to input an integer and returns the inputted integer.
        Parameters:
        message - The message, that should be print out to the user before forcing input.
        Returns:
        The read integer from the user input.

      • readInt

        private int readInt​(java.lang.String message,
                    int min,
                    int max)
        Forces the user to input an integer in the passed range and returns the inputted integer.
        Parameters:
        message - The message, that should be print out to the user before forcing input.
        min - The minimum value for the inputted integer.
        max - The maximum value for the inputted integer.
        Returns:
        The read integer from the user input.

      • readString

        private java.lang.String readString​(java.lang.String message,
                                    boolean allowEmpty)
        Forces the user to input a string and returns the inputted string.
        Parameters:
        message - The message, that should be print out to the user before forcing input.
        allowEmpty - Boolean value, that indicates whether the string can be empty or not.
        Returns:
        The read string from the user input.

      • returnToMainMenu

        private void returnToMainMenu​(java.lang.String message)
        Returns to the main menu after printing out the passed message and forcing the user to press enter.
        Parameters:
        message - The message that should be shown before transitioning.

      • searchPatientById

        private void searchPatientById()
        Renders the view for searching a patient by the id, reads the inputs and calls the necessary method on the controller.

      • searchPatientsByName

        private void searchPatientsByName()
        Renders the view for searching patients by last name, reads the inputs and calls the necessary method on the controller.

      • showActionSelect

        private void showActionSelect()
        Renders the main menu on the console.
